comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of April 27, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50D1EFF385C1373... indicated that Saint-Saens was to sail from Bordeaux for New York on the steamship Rochambeau. So he was on the same voyage as the cyclists in nearby pictures, e.g., www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/7753238064/
